Label.en: aside from maybe building fancy palaces to outshine their predecessors

Label.en: So King Assurbanipal I found a way to do both at the same time!
Label.fr: So King Assurbanipal I found a way to do both at the same time!
Label.es: So King Assurbanipal I found a way to do both at the same time!

Label.en: He built a gorgeous palace, and then decorated it with relief sculpture showing his skills in hunting!
Label.fr: He built a gorgeous palace, and then decorated it with relief sculpture showing his skills in hunting!
Label.es: He built a gorgeous palace, and then decorated it with relief sculpture showing his skills in hunting!

Label.en: Naturally, he presents himself as very skillful… whether it was true or not!

Label.es: Naturally, he presents himself as very skillful… whether it was true or not!
